Subscription.Description: Wireless 802.1x authentication, Detect wireless connection with a peer MAC address
Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <!-- Inspired by Microsoft Documentation and/or IADGOV --> <Query Id="0" Path="Security"> <!-- 5632: Request made to authenticate to Wireless network (including Peer MAC --> <!-- 5633: A request was made to authenticate to a wired network. --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=5632 or EventID=5633)]]</Select> </Query> </QueryList>
